description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvf29","text":"This protocol is for the research about the availability of Metadata from Open Journals in the DOAJ in Crossref.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qp98","text":"The goal is to find out how many papers from DOAJ journals are available on Crossref, whether their metadata is available and the origin of their references' DOIs. This will provide us a clearer picture about the state of Open Access research.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gsef","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k0r6","text":"Our research involves the articles from Open Access journals in DOAJ and their data on Crossref. We scouted the availability of these articles’ reference lists, the presence of IDs such as DOIs and the entities responsible for their specification. This analysis was carried using DOAJ article metadata dump, then modified and enriched thought Crossref’s APIs DOI requests. The data will be further analysed to verify the distribution of the provenance of the articles' DOIs.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bg75","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"5h694","text":"This methodology cleans and populates the batches of articles downloadable from the DOAJ website and populates them with the infromations from Crossref's API.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":143,"length":14}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ccil","text":"All the software to perform this methodologies can be found in the Github Repository for it. All the software is distributed under the MIT licence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":67,"length":6},{"key":3,"offset":135,"length":11}],"data":{}},{"key":"dki76","text":"To describe the data in input and output, we produced a Data Management Plan.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":56,"length":20}],"data":{}},{"key":"4oaft","text":"The main software is in multithread_populating.py, while main.py is the script used to launch the query from the command line. To populate, we also used the batches_cleaner.py and journals_cleaner.py softwares. At the end, we used also the populator.py script to add the missing details and the data_viz.ipynb notebook to create visualisations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":25},{"style":"bold","offset":57,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":157,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":180,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":240,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":295,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e1gr","text":"If you want to query Crossref through a DOI, you can create a populateJson instance and query the API with just the DOI. If you are interested in more complete access to the API, you can find here a more complete list of libraries that have a wider scope; another useful software that was of inspiration for the one used in here is oc_graphenricher.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":192,"length":4},{"key":6,"offset":332,"length":16}],"data":{}},{"key":"1j7i1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4EC72930CF6E11ECAC7F81C1CA01A009","url":"https://doaj.org/docs/public-data-dump/"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"68DD0470CF6E11ECAC7F81C1CA01A009","url":"https://www.crossref.org/documentation/retrieve-metadata/rest-api/"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8C8C9042CF6F11ECA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/open-sci/2021-2022-la-chouffe-code"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EF15DE30CF6F11ECAC7F81C1CA01A009","url":"https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT"}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6506F960CF7211EC9BB5FF4918E6483D","url":"https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6491625"}},"5":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"942BC05DCF6F11ECA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.crossref.org/blog/python-and-ruby-libraries-for-accessing-the-crossref-api/"}},"6":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A9CB8690CF6F11ECAC7F81C1CA01A009","url":"https://github.com/opencitations/oc_graphenricher"}}}}

To do so we used the main.py script that launches the multithread_populating.py software, both developed in python.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":156,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":188,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":17}],"data":{}},{"key":"97bje","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gvg0","text":"All methods developed for managing Crossref requests are listed as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"210583D5CF1011ECA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://api.crossref.org/swagger-ui/index.html"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46ev7","text":"For each article DOI, we sent a request through query_crossref method. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":14},{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8qi0","text":"As the process could encounter  some errors we coded our software in a way that saves a temporary file in the directory /temp. This latter shrewdness avoids us losing any progress we made, as the whole project was already long to undertake.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ck8qj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20jnl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c92g8","text":"query_crossref method launches requests to Crossref REST API in the format:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":17}],"data":{}},{"key":"7t1io","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92mcl","text":" https://api.crossref.org/works/{doi}","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":30},{"key":2,"offset":32,"length":5}],"data":{}},{"key":"5uug9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqv6m","text":"The method uses requests_cache, backoff, and ReadTimeout to avoid getting blocked and speed up the process. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":14},{"style":"italic","offset":32,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":45,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"encul","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kmll","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"57k34","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2E050097CF0C11ECA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://api.crossref.org/swagger-ui/index.html"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2E0500C7CF0C11ECA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://api.crossref.org/journals/0001-3765/works"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2E050058CF0C11ECA02B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://api.crossref.org/journals/0001-3765/works"}},"3":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"67lb","text":"def__init__(self) -> None:
    requests_cache.install_cache('multithread_cache')
    self.api = "https://api.crossref.org/works/"

    @backoff.on_exception(backoff.expo, requests.exceptions.ReadTimeout,                                     max_tries=20)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1m453","text":"def query_crossref(self, doi):

    query = self.api + doi

    req = requests.get(query, timeout=60)
    return req, doi","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emq74","text":"_read_json method iterates over articles stored in article_batch_[number].json.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18},{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjj8g","text":"ISSNs are here used as indexing numbers for the DOIs, grouping them under the journal they belong to.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ft62","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41o5o","text":"If the response status code is not equal to 200 the DOI is not present in Crossref, so we add those key value:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evvcv","text":"\"'crossref': 0","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs19b","text":"\"reference\": 0","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kicc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sl7b","text":"In other cases we read the response message and we add those key value:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afn6b","text":"\"crossref\": 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn7r2","text":"\"reference\": 0","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5db8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23ve1","text":"Then, if in the response are presents reference values we read the reference list to read reference articol information. Id DOI is present we add this key value to our reco:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k7tg","text":"\"doi\": \"article-doi\"","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4va","text":"\"doi\": \"not-specified\" (if not present)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6utd4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0gpl","text":"Then we look for the entities responsible for DOI specification that crossref saved under the key \"doi-asserted-by\". Consequentially, we add to reference informations this key value:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hs2v","text":"\"doi-asserted-by\": \"publisher\"","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i5k1","text":"\"doi-asserted-by\": \"crossref\"","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7628i","text":"\"doi-asserted-by\": \"not-specified\" (if not present)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65eui","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frg27","text":"When the file is finally populated a temporary copy is saved in temp/compleated to save time whether we need to restart the process.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
